Title: Sasurai no Violin
Description: ['A ', Minna no Uta, ' music video meant to illustrate variation of the violin. From the American cowboy fiddle to the South American tango to Japanese enka.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' The music video was aired for 2 years before becoming lost media. In 2014 the Minna no Uta Hakkutsu Project (Minna no Uta Excavation Project) was able to find discover a copy and the music video was saved and re-aired once again after 41 years.']
